column5: LTHM lowest RSI I have seen for a company that is profitable with positive growth outlook I feel like everyone who was handed shares from the FMC split off is simply running and selling with no real reason Cant find a reason to sell other than the depressed price Company looks like they are in a great position to capitalize on the future growth of the battery market
